episodes.title: Defense attorney of Indigenous actor says their client is being falsely accused | APTN News
episodes.description:
Nathan Chasing Horse’s trial began earlier this week in Las Vegas. 

He is on trial for multiple sexual assault charges and was accused of using his reputation as a medicine man to prey on Indigenous women and girls. 

#aptnnews #danceswithwolves

episodes.title: Jury trial underway for Indigenous actor from Oscar winning film Dances with Wolves | APTN News
episodes.description:
Best known for his role in Oscar winning film Dances with Wolves, Nathan Chasing Horse’s jury trial is underway in Las Vegas for being accused of sexually abusing women and girls while leading a cult. 

One of the victims was only 14-years-old. 

#aptnnews #indigenous #danceswithwolves

episodes.title: New charges announced against Dances with Wolves actor Nathan Chasing Horse | APTN News
episodes.description:
On Tuesday, new charges were announced against actor Nathan Chasing Horse in Nevada.

Currently in the Tsuut'ina First Nation in Alberta, Chasing Horse is accused of four counts of sexual assault.

APTN News spoke with Tsuut'ina police Sergeant Mike Cavilla.

#aptnnews #aptnalberta

episodes.title: ‘Dances with Wolves’ actor facing new charges in Nevada | APTN News
episodes.description:
New charges have been filed against Native American actor Nathan Chasing Horse in Las Vegas.

The Clark County prosecutor filed single counts of possessing and producing child sexual abuse materials against the 48-year-old.

Read more: https://www.aptnnews.ca/national-news/dances-with-wolves-actor-nathan-chasing-horse-facing-new-charges-in-nevada/

episodes.title: Details from the arrest paperwork of Nathan Chasing Horse | APTN News
episodes.description:
APTN's Edmonton-based reporter Danielle Paradis has been working on a number of interesting stories, including the Nathan Chasing Horse case.

She explains details from the arrest paperwork and what is known about the alleged victims.

episodes.title: Police report filed on Nathan Chasing Horse in 2015 says FSIN | APTN News
episodes.description:
'He was out there for eight years, without justice or without any follow-up': FSIN Vice Chief Heather Bear says that a woman filed a report to the Saskatoon police about Nathan Chasing Horse in 2015 but it’s not clear what happened after that.

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse banned from powwows in 2015 says former FSIN vice chief | APTN News
episodes.description:
'There were women who were afraid': Former FSIN vice-chief Kim Jonathan says she was on the executive in 2015 when it decided to ban Dances with Wolves actor Nathan Chasing Horse from the federation’s annual powwow.
